document_data.name: The Citadel
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Citadel''' was a fortress and prison in the city of [[Arabel]] in [[Cormyr]]. It was the largest building in that city and the home of the [[Army of the East]].
{{TOC limit|3}}
document_data.Description: The grand fortress was so large that it was visible from no matter where one stood in the city. It was designed primarily to be a fortress, and so it did not have many distinguishing features that did not serve it in that role.
document_data.Location:
The Citadel was located in the most prosperous section of the city, the north,{{Arabel map orientation}} near the [[Arabellan Palace]] and just west of the [[Lady's House]], a temple to [[Tymora]]. It was surrounded by multiple mansions of the rich nobles and merchants of the city.

The highest lookout tower on the city walls—where [[Kelemvor]] once battled [[Knightsbridge]]—was just north of the complex.
document_data.Services:
Adventuring charters, which were a requirement for [[adventurer]]s operating in Cormyr, could be acquired at the Citadel.

document_data.History: [[Aris (giant)|Aris]], [[Galaeron Nihmedu]], and [[Ruha]] were once held prisoner overnight in the Citadel's jail for their own protection from the [[Shadovar]].
